publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-985.1 Mr Murray Tosh: Transport (Scotland) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-985) in the name of Sarah Boyack, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "does not agree to the general principles of the Transport (Scotland) Bill because it opposes Part 3 (road user charging and workplace parking levy) including schedule 1, and section 69 (bridges)."
